title: Food safety guidelines for community food events
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Human Services, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Caterers and Catering - Hygienic Aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food handling
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food contamination - Prevention

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food
description: This video is designed to instruct people involved in producing food for community events such as fetes, festivals and food fairs, in its safe preparation, storage and cooking. It provides advice on ways to prevent contamination of food and is accompanied by pads of mini-posters (for distribution), reminding people of the basics of food safety. Kit contains a video cassette and two booklets.
